roleset.name: maintain body temperature within a specific range
roleset.note: THERMOREGULATE-V, THERMOREGULATION-N NOTES: Added by Julia for clearearth-biotexts.

example.name: thermoregulate-v
example.text: The same parameters were measured in bantam hens incubating eggs-1 artificially thermoregulated *trace*-1 to 40 degrees and 25 degrees C (Te).

example.name: thermoregulation-n
example.text: One of the most profoundly advantageous features of viviparity is thermoregulation of the embryo .
